reviews.review: Great game to play if you have friends to play it with. Some players are very toxic but the game is fum. The constant updates keep it interesting. With every new content update, the game stays afloat.

CS:GO is a good game, but. . . without all these cheaters. I always against cheaters when i start a ranked game. (Huh... ok my Trust Factor is incredibly bad). But where is the fun of playing against cheaters? So, find a way to kick out all these cheaters and this going to be a very good game :)

PogChamp Operation Shattered Web

EDIT 1: PogChamp Operation Broken Fang

EDIT 2: PauseChamp Operation Riptide

This game is fun
